title: Topics in CNM
description: This module deals with specialised topics in Communications and New Media. The topics covered reflect the expertise of staff members of emerging issues in Communications and New Media.
prerequisite:
Cohort 2006 and before: Read and passed a minimum of  80MCs. 
Cohort 2007 onwards:Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in NM, with a minimum CAP of 3.5 or be on the Honours track.
